attributes.action: Protect the shia minority - Pakistan, Shia's.
attributes.additional_details: I want the parliament to write to the prime minister of Pakistan and also off  to protect the life, liberty, and honour of the minority citizens of the State of Pakistan irrespective of their race, religion, ethnic, and racial background. In Pakistan, Shia's in general and specifically,.
attributes.background: I want this to be raised in parliament and I believe this is my responsibility to raise a voice to protect the life, liberty, and honor of the minority citizens of the State of Pakistan irrespective of their race, religion, ethnic, and racial background. In Pakistan, Shia's in general and specific.

rejection.details: Decisions about domestic policy in Pakistan is a matter for the political institutions in Pakistan, not the Government or House of Commons.
